name: Age of Glitch
description:
This game is about a programmer called Aleksi and his day of being a game programming student. Focus of the game is to manage various difficult tasks as a programming student including putting on pants, fixing bugs and brewing coffee. The game was made for Global Game Jam 2020 with Unity.

Game made by:

  • Riku Heino
  • Milo Hakalahti
  • Teemu Turku
  • Tarita Karhulahti
  • Harto Kuukka
  • Janessa Aulén
